name: navidpaya.github.io
body:
# Home, Sweet Home
After having a blog on Tumblr which I barely use, I decided to move somewhere more "geeky", mostly because I was sick of thinking what theme would appeal most and such. So github pages and Jekyll sounded like a big win. Now all left to see is if I will actually pull it together and keep writing here. I guess we'll see about that.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
